actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for the relief of local prosecutors and sheriffs.
short_title: Local Prosecutor's and Sheriff's Relief Act of 1982
subjects: Federal aid to law enforcement agencies
subjects_top_term: Federal aid to law enforcement agencies

summary.text: Local Prosecutors and Sheriff's Relief Act of 1982 - Authorizes the Attorney General, in his sole discretion, to make grants to assist State and local governments to meet the expenses of prosecuting defendants, maintaining courtroom security, or maintaining defendants in custody when a Federal interest is served by the prosecution of such defendants. Allows the Attorney General to authorize rules to carry out this Act. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1982 through 1984.

titles.title: Local Prosecutor's and Sheriff's Relief Act of 1982
A bill to provide for the relief of local prosecutors and sheriffs.
